answers.answer: I think metformin probably lowered my sugar, also exercise is supposed to help a lot

question: I went to a university endo and he said my ha1c of 6.4 wasn't diabetic?my other endo started me on metformin saying it would cure my exhaustion from bloodsugar spikes (I drink soda), but it hasn't seemed to help but it did lower my ha1c to 5.1, butI still feel tired and am overweightI think my exhuastion, memory problems are from sleep apnea
title: diabetes exhaustion?
